author: Golden Shades

text: @xBlackxZerox sure, this tune kicks ass, gotta love the square 2 effects at 0:20, I realized that theres just too many fanboys out there, so I think I should stop fighting with them, but, if they come to a MM video and one comment says "MM *insert number here* is better" I'm gonna have to shut him up
author: Golden Shades

text: @xBlackxZerox I'm not defending MM4, I'm just trying to make the world realize that megaman 2  is not the best game ever, and every other megaman game is not bad just because megaman 2 exists, about the music, yeah dude, when I do stuff in my computer I really like to put some megaman music, AND i don't mean MM4, i mean every megaman song, and MM4 IS godlike, MM is godlike (I think we can all agree with that) but I hate people that says ONLY MM2 is godlike and the rest are bullshit
author: Golden Shades

text: @xBlackxZerox I hate people like that guy because they don't see beyond MM2, I mean every megaman game has something to it, I don't gey why they keep commenting on MM4, MM5 and MM6 videos about how MM2 rocks and its the bestast game evar!!!1!!1!, they need to open their eyes, also I think you should have stated "I'm here to listen the music AND to respond to assholes" but since you didn't, YOU are the one who needs to shut up and listen to the music, you fucking bastart
author: Golden Shades

text: @xBlackxZerox I'm here to listen to the music, but if MM2 fanboys come here to say that a song that isn't even from this game is better than god, then I think my job is to do justice, so shut up schmuck-ass cat blower

text: @xBlackxZerox look pal, opinions were invented to express them, I enjoy the music, but I also enjoy expressing my opinion, so fuck off you fucking fucker
